data.description: Welcome Home! This Craftsman-style gem in Happy Valley's Reserve neighborhood is like new. From the moment you enter through the front door, enjoy stunning west facing panoramic views to the Coast Range and the front of the home faces protected green space. Lovely views no matter which way you look. This semi-custom home features five bedrooms, three bathrooms; with the primary and guest bedroom on the main floor, both ensuites. High ceilings throughout, with 8 ft doors. The kitchen has quartz counters, stainless steel appliances, a walk-in pantry, and a butler's pantry. Acacia wood flooring shines throughout most of the main level. Adding to this home's features are central air conditioning  and an oversized hot water heater. A separate office, lots of storage, and a finished three-car tandem garage add value to this home. Located 20 minutes from both the airport and downtown, Happy Valley offers highly regarded schools, many amenities and numerous community events including the Fourth of July parade and Oktoberfest which are hosted at the Happy Valley Park. Along with the annual holiday tree lighting ceremony held at City Hall. This home truly has it all- luxury, comfort, and a view that's hard to beat!
